title: Make grevious wounds stronger
body:
SO many champions become overpowered when excessive healing comes into play, and the current bans (atleast in my low elo shitty bronze ranks) always include Mundo, Darius, Vayne and Jax, when these champions are on a roll there is little you can do to stop them UNLESS you have very specific champ builds and setups, like CC that is not a skillshot that cant be dodged (E.G Ryzes rune prison) but even then that only holds them down for a short time, all the while vayne can be auto attacking and outhealing what the ryze can deal, and mundo can just sit there and not give any single fks about anything anybody throws at him.

i personally think that this is because Grievous wounds is far too weak, i mean how many times have you 5 man jumped on mundo and ignited him, but he still outheals thanks to his ult, or had darius just spamming Q in your team and healing insane amounts (if he builds some hp), even if you have a {{item:3033}} or {{item:3165}} they can just keep tanking with their regeneration

Grievous wounds should be at least 75% healing reduction, buying a mortal reminder should be a tactical decision for your team, like the garen could get one to keep applying Grievous wounds to the bulk of the opposing team with his spinning.

im expecting a few people to hate on me for this, so why not just say what i think anyway, delete riven from the entire game, i mean what cockrag came up with that overpowered whore
